name: Ronin Revengeance
description:
Ronin Revengeance is a Samurai action adventure 3D top down game that blends gorgeous graphics, innovative gameplay, and intense boss battles, all within the palm of your hands. Experience full action fighting war battle adventure game based on sumarai theme in full 3D low poly graphics.

Play as "Tsushim" the great Samurai revenge adventure set in Edo period Japan with hack n slash elements. An action adventure fighting game where you can be a brave Samurai. Ronin Revengeance, one of the best 3D Top Down game where you experience a samurai taking down Demons with visually stunning graphics.

⚔ Story

This story belongs to a edo kingdom surrounded by mountains, a land of secrets. Tsushim a Samurai with a lethal Katana who is on a journey to avenge his Master’s death.His Master, the emperor of the kingdom was murdered in front of him by the the Demon King Tenmaou.

⚔ Features

🔹 Play as "Tsushim" the great Samurai 

🔹 Compete with Demons and Slaves

🔹 Hack & Slash Sword Action

🔹 Top Down Parry based action

🔹 Unlock multiple different powers that will help you on your journey

🔹 Defeat The Grear Demon King, Tenmaou

🔹 Control Graphics quality

⚔ Gameplay

Control the main player Tsushim in directional strafe movements.Use buttons to Draw/Sheet the katana and attack using Attack button.Roll and Sprint button is for quickly dodge enemies.Defend button is most important to 

parry /counter enemy attacks.Take care of the health as it is the most crucial part of the gameplay.Different enemies requires different strategy to defeat.

⚔ Requirements

This game requires a minimum of Snapdragon 660, MediaTek G35 or equivalent with minimum of 3GB of RAM.

Reduce the quality setting if the game lags or device heat up.
